content:
The man notices that Sub05 is not wearing any underwear beneath her skimpy outfit, and his smile widens even further. He leers at her hungrily, his eyes roving over her exposed skin.

"Well, well, well," he says, his voice low and husky. "Looks like you're not wearing anything underneath that outfit, sweetheart. That's very...provocative of you. Are you trying to seduce me?"

Sub05 feels a surge of fear and disgust, but she knows she must play along in order to keep Dom happy. She forces a smile onto her face and lowers her eyes demurely.

"I'm not trying to seduce you, sir," she says, her voice trembling. "I'm just...following orders. My friend, the policeman, he likes it when I dress like this. He says it's...sexy."

The man's smile widens, and he leans in even closer to her. "Well, I'm sure he'll be very pleased to see you looking like this. I know I am. You're a very beautiful and obedient little thing, aren't you?"

Sub05 can feel his hot breath on her face, and she fights the urge to push him away. She knows she must continue to play along in order to keep Dom happy, no matter how humiliated and degraded she feels.
